column1: M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J.
The instant application emanates from the cancellation of permit bearing No.
279/31  (P  2)  issued  by  the  1st  Respondent  under  the  Land  Development
Ordinance, as amended (hereinafter referred to as the ‘L.D.O.’).
The Petitioner inter-alia sought a writ of certiorari against the 1st Respondent
quashing the decision to terminate the grant (sic) bearing No. 279/31 of the
Petitioner  as  per  ‘P  13’  and  a  writ  of  Mandamus  against  the  1st  to  2nd
Respondents  to  conduct  a  fair  investigation  and  reissue  the  grant  (sic)  No.
